verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G659>putting<s%> <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%> and <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> and <S%G5355>envy<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2636>slander,<s%>

<S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G738>newborn<s%> <S%G1025>babes,<s%> <S%G1971>long<s%> for the <S%G97>pure<s%> <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G3050>word,<s%> that by it you may <S%G837>grow<s%> in <S%G1519>respect<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation,<s%>
<S%G1487>if<s%> you have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G5543>kindness<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And <S%G4334>coming<s%> to Him as to a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G593>rejected<s%> by <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G1588>choice<s%> and <S%G1784>precious<s%> in the <S%G3844>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

you <S%G2532>also,<s%> as <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> are being <S%G2026>built<s%> up as a <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> for a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood,<s%> to <S%G399>offer<s%> up <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For [this] is <S%G4023>contained<s%> in <S%G1124>Scripture:<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> in <S%G4622>Zion<s%> a <S%G1588>choice<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> a <S%G1784>precious<s%> <S%G204>corner<s%> [stone], And he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him shall not be <S%G2617>disappointed.<s%>"

<S%G3588>This<s%> <S%G5092>precious<s%> <S%G5092>value,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> is for you who <S%G4100>believe.<s%> But for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G569>disbelieve,<s%> "The <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G2776>very<s%> <S%G1137>corner<s%> [stone,]"

and, "A <S%G3037>stone<s%> of <S%G4348>stumbling<s%> and a <S%G4073>rock<s%> of <S%G4625>offense<s%>"; for they <S%G4350>stumble<s%> because they are <S%G544>disobedient<s%> to the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and to <S%G3739>this<s%> [doom] they were <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5087>appointed.<s%>

But you are a <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G1085>race,<s%> a <S%G934>royal<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood,<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> for [God's] own <S%G4047>possession,<s%> that you may <S%G1804>proclaim<s%> the <S%G703>excellencies<s%> of Him who has <S%G2564>called<s%> you out of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> into His <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> <S%G5457>light;<s%>

for you <S%G4218>once<s%> were not a <S%G2992>people,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> you are the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> you had not <S%G1653>received<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> you have <S%G1653>received<s%> <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you as <S%G3941>aliens<s%> and <S%G3927>strangers<s%> to <S%G568>abstain<s%> from <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4754>wage<s%> <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G5590>soul.<s%>

<S%G2192>Keep<s%> your <S%G391>behavior<s%> <S%G2570>excellent<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that in the thing in <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G2635>slander<s%> you as <S%G2555>evildoers,<s%> they may on <S%G1537>account<s%> of your <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds,<s%> as they <S%G2029>observe<s%> [them,] <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G1984>visitation.<s%>

<S%G5293>Submit<s%> yourselves for the Lord's <S%G1223>sake<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G442>human<s%> <S%G2937>institution,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> to a <S%G935>king<s%> as the one in <S%G5242>authority,<s%>

<S%G1535>or<s%> to <S%G2232>governors<s%> as <S%G3992>sent<s%> by him for the <S%G1557>punishment<s%> of <S%G2555>evildoers<s%> and the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of those who <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>right.<s%>

For <S%G3779>such<s%> is the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> that by <S%G15>doing<s%> <S%G15>right<s%> you may <S%G5392>silence<s%> the <S%G56>ignorance<s%> of <S%G878>foolish<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

[Act] as <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>men,<s%> and do not <S%G2192>use<s%> your <S%G1657>freedom<s%> as a <S%G1942>covering<s%> for <S%G2549>evil,<s%> but [use it] as <S%G1401>bondslaves<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men;<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G81>brotherhood,<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G935>king.<s%>

<S%G3610>Servants,<s%> be <S%G5293>submissive<s%> to your <S%G1203>masters<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5401>respect,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G4646>unreasonable.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> [finds] <S%G5485>favor,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of <S%G4893>conscience<s%> toward <S%G2316>God<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5297>bears<s%> up <S%G5297>under<s%> <S%G3077>sorrows<s%> when <S%G3958>suffering<s%> <S%G95>unjustly.<s%>

For <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2811>credit<s%> is there <S%G1487>if,<s%> when you <S%G264>sin<s%> and are <S%G2852>harshly<s%> <S%G2852>treated,<s%> you <S%G5278>endure<s%> it with <S%G5278>patience<s%>? But <S%G1487>if<s%> when you <S%G15>do<s%> what is <S%G15>right<s%> and <S%G3958>suffer<s%> [for it] you <S%G5278>patiently<s%> <S%G5278>endure<s%> it, <S%G3778>this<s%> [finds] <S%G5485>favor<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For you have been <S%G2564>called<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> purpose, <S%G3754>since<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> for you, <S%G5277>leaving<s%> you an <S%G5261>example<s%> for you to <S%G1872>follow<s%> in His <S%G2487>steps,<s%>
<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> was any <S%G1388>deceit<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> in His <S%G4750>mouth;<s%>

and while being <S%G3058>reviled,<s%> He did not <S%G486>revile<s%> in <S%G486>return;<s%> while <S%G3958>suffering,<s%> He <S%G546>uttered<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G546>threats,<s%> but kept <S%G3860>entrusting<s%> [Himself] to Him who <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G1346>righteously;<s%>

and He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G399>bore<s%> our <S%G266>sins<s%> in His <S%G4983>body<s%> on the <S%G3586>cross,<s%> that we might <S%G581>die<s%> to <S%G266>sin<s%> and <S%G2198>live<s%> to <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> for by His <S%G3468>wounds<s%> you were <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

For you were continually <S%G4105>straying<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> you have <S%G1994>returned<s%> to the <S%G4166>Shepherd<s%> and <S%G1985>Guardian<s%> of your <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
